segments.text: I see the two children engaged in their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on that wobbly stool, quite precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already deep inside the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they are being incredibly sneaky right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet door frames their little conspiracy perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, pure and unadulterated mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of a warm cookie right now sounds quite delightful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focus is so intense, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They clearly have a well-rehearsed plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The "COOKIE JAR" label is prominently displayed, almost mocking the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR
